content.p: Senior Licencing Executive in Healthcare, Financial & Business Services Jonny works in the IP and Commercialisation Office, focusing on the evaluation and protection of intellectual property (IP) and licensing IP to commercial partners. He has worked in Technology Transfer since 2016, first with Imperial College, and now at UoN, specialising in Healthcare and Life Sciences technologies. Prior to that, he worked for a specialist consultancy firm, focused on commercial strategy and buy-side due diligence in the medicine and care sectors. He completed a PhD directed at self-assembling peptide hydrogels at the University of Manchester and holds BA and MEng degrees in Chemical Engineering from the University of Cambridge Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
